mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into course (`name`, code, category_id, description, price, `status`, open_date, last_update_on, `level`, shared, shared_url, avatar, big_avatar, certification, certification_duration ) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{lastUpdateOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shared,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sharedUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bigAvatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certificationDuration,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update course set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, open_date = #{openDate,jdbcType=DATE}, last_update_on = #{lastUpdateOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `level` = #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shared = #{shared,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shared_url = #{sharedUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, avatar = #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, big_avatar = #{bigAvatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, certification = #{certification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, certification_duration = #{certificationDuration,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, `name`, code, category_id, description, price, `status`, open_date, last_update_on, `level`, shared, shared_url, avatar, big_avatar, certification, certification_duration from course where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
